name: pokemon-idle-mmo
description: Pokemon Idle MMO - A web-based idle game where players deploy trainers to catch Pokemon

scripts.dev:server: npm run build:shared && cd apps/game-server && npm run dev
scripts.dev:web: npm run build:shared && cd apps/web && npm run dev
scripts.build:server: npm run build:shared && cd apps/game-server && npm run build
scripts.build:web: npm run build:shared && cd apps/web && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run build:shared && cd apps/game-server && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../web && npx tsc --noEmit
